skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Toxic Breath

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns
skills.name: Long Fangs

skills.desc: Decreases damage taken by this Champion and all allies by 15%.
skills.name: Dragonhide [Passive]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]
